title: Sushi Planet
typeOfFood: Ovo, Japanese, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Japanese food and sushi bar restaurant with several area locations. Do specify if you are veg/vegan and say "no egg, no mayonnaise," the staff will assist you. There's vegetable fried rolls, salads, a vegetarian bento box. The vegetable tempura and the tofu in tempura might be fried in same oil as meat - please check and let HappyCow know.
